title: Charming Victorian Terrace with Garden
description: Step into history with this beautifully maintained three-story Victorian terrace. Features original hardwood floors, high ceilings, a modern chef's kitchen, and a secluded rear garden. Located on a quiet, tree-lined street, minutes from public transport.

title: Modern Loft Living near Downtown Core
description: Sleek, open-concept loft unit featuring polished concrete floors, 18-foot ceilings, and oversized industrial windows with stunning city views. Includes one secured underground parking spot and access to a rooftop patio.

title: Family Oasis: 4 Bed/3 Bath in Top School District
description: Perfect family home! This spacious ranch features four bedrooms, three updated bathrooms, a finished basement, and a large, fenced backyard ideal for children and pets. Highly sought-after location near top-rated schools.

title: Cozy Starter Condo with Low HOA Fees
description: An excellent opportunity for first-time buyers. This bright one-bedroom, one-bath unit offers a functional layout, in-unit laundry, and is conveniently located close to major shopping centres and highways. Pet-friendly building.

title: Luxury Penthouse with Panoramic Ocean Views
description: Experience unparalleled luxury in this top-floor residence. Private elevator access, floor-to-ceiling glass walls, and a massive wrap-around terrace overlooking the coast. Custom smart-home technology and five-star amenities included.

title: Rustic Cabin Retreat on 5 Private Acres
description: Escape the city to this serene log cabin nestled deep in the woods. Features a stone fireplace, large front porch, and access to nearby hiking trails. Ideal for nature lovers or as a weekend rental investment.

title: Newly Built Townhome: Contemporary Finishes
description: Brand new construction! Three-bedroom, two-and-a-half-bath townhome with a single-car garage. Kitchen boasts quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances. Energy-efficient design in a rapidly developing community.

title: Historic Tudor Revival in Exclusive Neighbourhood
description: A rare gem! This magnificent Tudor home retains its original charm with exposed beams and leaded glass windows, paired with fully updated systems. Features a grand entry and a detached two-car garage.

title: Investor Special: Duplex with High Rental Income
description: Turnkey investment property offering two separate, well-maintained units (2 bed/1 bath each). Separate meters and leases in place. High occupancy rate in a desirable rental area. Great cash flow potential.

title: Sun-Drenched Studio Steps from the Beach
description: Affordable coastal living! Compact, efficient studio apartment located just a block from the boardwalk. Perfect for a vacation getaway or a minimalist lifestyle. Low maintenance and quick closing possible.

title: Expansive Equestrian Property with Barn
description: Over 10 acres of usable land with a fully equipped eight-stall barn, paddock, and riding arena. The main house is a well-kept three-bedroom farmhouse. Perfect setup for horse enthusiasts.

title: Renovator's Dream: Solid Bones, Needs TLC
description: Priced to sell! This three-bedroom bungalow is structurally sound but requires cosmetic updates. A fantastic opportunity to customize your dream home in an established, quiet neighbourhood.

title: Mid-Century Modern with Pool and Patio
description: Iconic architectural style with clean lines and abundant natural light. Features include a sparkling in-ground pool, a large covered patio for entertaining, and original vintage tile work. Located in a sought-after cul-de-sac.

title: High-Rise Condo with Full Amenities and Security
description: Enjoy the convenience of city life with 24-hour security, concierge services, a gym, and a communal lounge. This two-bedroom unit features in-suite laundry and a private balcony overlooking the park.

title: Move-In Ready Ranch near Golf Course
description: Impeccably maintained single-story ranch home. Features an open-plan living area, a newly updated kitchen with granite counters, and a spacious two-car garage. Just a short walk to the local country club.

title: Lakefront Home with Private Dock and Boathouse
description: Your year-round vacation spot! This spacious four-bedroom home offers direct lake access, a private dock, and a fully functional boathouse. Enjoy incredible sunset views from the expansive deck.

title: Urban Semi-Detached with Rooftop Terrace
description: Stylish semi-detached home spread over four levels. Features a gourmet kitchen, an attached garage, and a stunning, private rooftop terrace perfect for summer gatherings. Excellent walk score.

title: Affordable Manufactured Home in 55+ Community
description: Relaxed living awaits! This well-kept manufactured home is located in a quiet, age-restricted community. Includes access to a clubhouse, pool, and organised social activities. Low lot rent.

title: Executive Estate on Acreage with Gated Entry
description: A truly private retreat. Custom-built mansion set on rolling hills, accessed via a private, gated driveway. Features a grand foyer, indoor cinema room, and luxury finishes throughout.

title: Bright and Airy Bungalow with Basement Suite Potential
description: Versatile property with a separate entrance to the partially finished basement, offering great income potential. The main floor is bright, with large windows and a newly painted interior.
